magic.name: Archmage Ascension
magic.description: 대마법사의 승천. 끊임없는 지식 탐구 끝에 도달하는 마법의 정점. 원하는 모든 지식을 즉시 떠올릴 수 있게 된다.
magic.effect: 완벽한 지식 접근 - 필요한 주문을 즉시 기억해낼 수 있음
magic.cardEffect:
At the beginning of each end step, if you drew two or more cards this turn, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
As long as this enchantment has six or more quest counters on it, if you would draw a card, you may instead search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle.
magic.loreDescription: 대마법사의 승천. 끊임없는 지식 탐구와 마법 연구 끝에 도달하는 마법의 정점. 이 경지에 오른 마법사는 필요한 모든 지식을 순간적으로 떠올릴 수 있으며, 우주의 비밀조차 그들 앞에 열린다. 타지임의 머포크 현자들 사이에서 전해지는 궁극의 수련법.

magic.name: Beastmaster Ascension
magic.description: 야수조련사의 승천. 충분한 전투를 통해 야수들과 완벽한 유대를 형성하면, 모든 동료 야수가 폭발적으로 강해진다.
magic.effect: 야수 군단 강화 - 함께하는 모든 생물이 압도적인 힘을 얻음
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever a creature you control attacks, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
As long as this enchantment has seven or more quest counters on it, creatures you control get +5/+5.
magic.loreDescription: 야수조련사의 승천. 수많은 전투를 통해 야수들과 완벽한 유대를 형성하면 도달하는 경지. 이 상태에 이르면 함께하는 모든 야수가 폭발적인 힘을 얻어, 작은 곤충도 맹수처럼 강해진다. 무라사 숲의 엘프 드루이드들이 전하는 비전.

magic.name: Pyromancer Ascension
magic.description: 화염술사의 승천. 같은 주문을 반복 숙달하여 완벽한 경지에 오르면, 모든 주문이 자동으로 복제된다.
magic.effect: 주문 복제 - 시전하는 모든 마법이 두 배의 위력
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that has the same name as a card in your graveyard, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell while this enchantment has two or more quest counters on it, you may copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
magic.loreDescription: 화염술사의 승천. 같은 주문을 반복하여 완벽히 숙달하면, 결국 모든 마법이 자동으로 두 배의 위력을 발휘하는 경지에 오른다. 아쿰의 화산에서 수련하는 화염술사들 사이에서 전해지는 전설적인 비법.

magic.name: Rite of Replication
magic.description: 복제 의식. 대상의 완벽한 복제본을 만들어낸다. 더 많은 마나를 쏟으면 다섯 개의 복제본을 동시에 생성할 수 있다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.
magic.loreDescription: 복제 의식. 대상의 본질을 포착하여 완벽한 복제본을 만들어내는 고급 비전 마법. 숙련된 시전자는 한 번에 다섯 개의 복제본을 동시에 생성할 수 있다. 머포크 마법사들이 지식 보존을 위해 개발했다고 전해진다.

magic.name: Gigantiform
magic.description: 거대화 마법. 대상을 거대한 형태로 변신시킨다. 숙련된 시전자는 연쇄적으로 여러 대상을 거대화시킬 수 있다.
magic.effect: 대상을 8/8 크기의 거인으로 변신, 돌진 능력 부여
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {4}
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has base power and toughness 8/8 and has trample.
When this Aura enters, if it was kicked, you may search your library for a card named Gigantiform, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
magic.loreDescription: 거대화. 자연의 힘을 끌어와 대상을 거대한 형태로 변신시키는 마법. 숙련된 드루이드는 연쇄적으로 여러 동료를 거대화시킬 수 있다. 오란-리프 숲의 엘프들이 침략자에 맞서 사용하는 방어 마법.

magic.name: Elemental Appeal
magic.description: 정령 호출. 순수한 화염 정령을 소환한다. 더 많은 마나를 쏟으면 압도적인 힘의 정령이 나타나지만, 오래 유지되지 않는다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.)
Create a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +7/+0 until end of turn.
magic.loreDescription: 정령 호출. 젠디카르의 순수한 마나를 응축하여 화염 정령을 소환하는 마법. 소환된 정령은 압도적인 파괴력을 지니지만, 오래 유지되지 않는다. 아쿰의 샤먼들이 위급한 순간에 사용하는 비장의 술법.

magic.name: Electropotence
magic.description: 전기력. "생명과 힘이 충돌하는 곳." 소환되는 모든 생물에게 번개의 힘을 부여하여, 등장과 동시에 적을 공격하게 한다.
magic.effect: 소환된 생물이 자신의 힘만큼 번개 피해를 입힘
magic.cardEffect: Whenever a creature you control enters, you may pay {2}{R}. If you do, that creature deals damage equal to its power to any target.
magic.flavorText: Where life and force collide.
magic.loreDescription: 전기력. "생명과 힘이 충돌하는 곳." 이 마법을 시전하면 소환되는 모든 생물에게 번개의 힘이 깃들어, 나타나는 순간 적을 강타한다. 젠디카르의 불안정한 마나가 만들어낸 독특한 강화술.

magic.name: Predatory Urge
magic.description: 포식 충동. 대상에게 야생의 본능을 불어넣어, 먹잇감을 직접 사냥할 수 있게 한다. 젠디카르 야수들의 생존 본능을 마법으로 재현한 것.
magic.effect: 대상이 다른 생물을 직접 공격하여 싸울 수 있음
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to this creature."
magic.loreDescription: 포식 충동. 대상에게 야생의 사냥 본능을 불어넣는 마법. 이 마법에 걸린 생물은 먹잇감을 직접 추적하고 사냥할 수 있게 된다. 발라 게드 정글의 엘프 사냥꾼들이 사용하는 기본 강화술.

magic.name: Brave the Elements
magic.description: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
magic.loreDescription: 원소에 맞서다. 코르 전사들의 방어 마법. 특정 색의 공격을 완전히 무효화한다.
magic.cardEffect: Choose a color. White creatures you control gain protection from the chosen color until end of turn.
magic.flavorText:
"Trust me, your lost fingers and toes are nothing compared to the lost treasures of Sejiri."
—Zahr Gada, Halimar expedition leader

magic.name: Feast of Blood
magic.description:
Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.
Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
magic.loreDescription: 피의 향연. 뱀파이어 의식. 동족이 함께하면 적을 죽이고 생명력을 얻는다.
magic.cardEffect:
Cast this spell only if you control two or more Vampires.
Destroy target creature. You gain 4 life.
magic.flavorText:
"The vampires of this world don't know the pleasures of hunger. They gorge themselves without savoring the kill."
—Sorin Markov

magic.name: Landbind Ritual
magic.description: You gain 2 life for each Plains you control.
magic.loreDescription: 반역의 낙인. 구울 드라즈 뱀파이어들이 사용하는 정신 지배 마법. 적의 생물을 일시적으로 빼앗아 조종하고, 전투 의욕까지 불태운다.
magic.cardEffect: You gain 2 life for each Plains you control.
magic.flavorText:
"Honor this place, for our children's children will stand here and speak these same words again."
—Ayli, Kamsa cleric

magic.name: Mark of Mutiny
magic.description: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
magic.loreDescription: 반역의 낙인. 구울 드라즈 뱀파이어들이 사용하는 정신 지배 마법. 적의 생물을 일시적으로 빼앗아 조종하고, 전투 의욕까지 불태운다.
magic.cardEffect: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Put a +1/+1 counter on it and untap it. That creature gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
magic.flavorText: The flame of anger is hard to douse once lit.

magic.name: Marsh Casualties
magic.description:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.
magic.loreDescription: 늪의 재앙. 구울 드라즈의 저주. 약한 생물들을 쓸어버린다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures target player controls get -1/-1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, those creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn instead.

magic.name: Mind Sludge
magic.description: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.
magic.loreDescription: 정신 슬러지. 늪의 힘으로 적의 마음을 짓이기는 마법.
magic.cardEffect: Target player discards a card for each Swamp you control.
magic.flavorText:
"Guard your thoughts. You never know who might wish to take them from you."
—Kalitas, Bloodchief of Ghet

magic.name: Primal Bellow
magic.description: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.
magic.loreDescription: 원초적 포효. 숲의 힘을 끌어내는 마법. 숲이 많을수록 더 강해진다.
magic.cardEffect: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each Forest you control.
magic.flavorText:
"A might spell can be handy against baloths, giants, kraken, the Roil—or if you lose your bearings in the woods."
—Chadir the Navigator

magic.name: Punishing Fire
magic.description:
Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.
magic.loreDescription: 응징의 불꽃. 적이 생명력을 얻으면 무덤에서 되살아나는 저주받은 화염.
magic.cardEffect:
Punishing Fire deals 2 damage to any target.
Whenever an opponent gains life, you may pay {R}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand.

magic.name: Quest for Ancient Secrets
magic.description:
Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove five quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.
magic.loreDescription: 고대 비밀 탐구. 충분한 지식을 모으면 무덤의 비밀을 되살린다.
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove five quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Target player shuffles their graveyard into their library.

magic.name: Quest for Pure Flame
magic.description:
Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove four quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: If any source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.
magic.loreDescription: 순수한 화염 탐구. 피해를 축적하면 폭발적인 화력을 얻는다.
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever a source you control deals damage to an opponent, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove four quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: If any source you control would deal damage to a permanent or player this turn, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

magic.name: Quest for the Gemblades
magic.description:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a creature, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove a quest counter from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.
magic.loreDescription: 보석칼 탐구. 생물이 죽을 때마다 힘이 쌓여 결국 강력한 힘을 부여한다.
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a creature, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove a quest counter from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Put four +1/+1 counters on target creature.

magic.name: Quest for the Gravelord
magic.description:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.
magic.loreDescription: 무덤 군주 탐구. 죽음을 모아 거대한 좀비를 소환하는 사령술.
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever a creature dies, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Create a 5/5 black Zombie Giant creature token.

magic.name: Quest for the Holy Relic
magic.description:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove five quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, attach it to a creature you control, then shuffle.
magic.loreDescription: 성스러운 유물 탐구. 충분한 생물을 모으면 전설적인 장비를 찾아낸다.
magic.cardEffect:
Whenever you cast a creature spell, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove five quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Search your library for an Equipment card, put it onto the battlefield, attach it to a creature you control, then shuffle.

magic.name: Summoner's Bane
magic.description: Counter target creature spell. Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token.
magic.loreDescription: 소환사의 파멸. 소환을 방해하고 그 힘을 빼앗는 마법.
magic.cardEffect: Counter target creature spell. Create a 2/2 blue Illusion creature token.
magic.flavorText:
"I don't need to have the perfect plan. My foe just has to have an imperfect one."
—Jace Beleren

magic.name: Trapmaker's Snare
magic.description: Search your library for a Trap card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
magic.loreDescription: 함정제작자의 올가미. 원하는 함정을 찾아내는 마법. 젠디카르 탐험가의 필수 기술.
magic.cardEffect: Search your library for a Trap card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
magic.flavorText: "Trapmaking is an art. The trap is a corporeal riddle, a battle of wits between its creator and whatever it lures inside."

magic.name: Unstable Footing
magic.description:
Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Damage can't be prevented this turn. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
magic.loreDescription: 불안정한 발판. 로완 현상을 일으켜 적의 발을 헛디디게 하는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {3}{R} (You may pay an additional {3}{R} as you cast this spell.)
Damage can't be prevented this turn. If this spell was kicked, it deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
magic.flavorText: A long way down is shorter than you think.

magic.name: Windborne Charge
magic.description: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.
magic.loreDescription: 바람을 탄 돌격. 비행 능력을 부여하는 코르의 전투 마법.
magic.cardEffect: Two target creatures you control each get +2/+2 and gain flying until end of turn.
magic.flavorText: The merfolk call the sky goddess Emeria. The kor call her Kamsa. The two races agree on little except that she offers many blessings to the faithful.

magic.name: Beast Hunt
magic.description: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
magic.loreDescription: 야수 사냥. 무라사 엘프 드루이드들의 소환 기술. 서고에서 생물 카드를 찾아내어 손에 더하는 자연과의 교감 마법.
magic.cardEffect: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Put all creature cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
magic.flavorText:
"Surely we could tame something besides hurdas and pillarfield oxen!"
—Sheyda, Ondu gamekeeper

magic.name: Bold Defense
magic.description:
Kicker {3}{W} (You may pay an additional {3}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, instead creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike until end of turn.
magic.loreDescription: 대담한 방어. 코르 전사들의 방어 기술. 위기의 순간 아군을 강화한다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {3}{W} (You may pay an additional {3}{W} as you cast this spell.)
Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, instead creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike until end of turn.

magic.name: Burst Lightning
magic.description:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.
magic.loreDescription: 철거. 아쿰 고블린들이 즐겨 사용하는 파괴 마법. 건물이든 마법 물품이든 가리지 않고 산산조각 낸다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Burst Lightning deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, it deals 4 damage instead.

magic.name: Cancel
magic.description: Counter target spell.
magic.loreDescription: 취소. 기본적인 대항 마법. 상대의 주문을 무효화한다.
magic.cardEffect: Counter target spell.
magic.flavorText: Zendikar's volatile mana is the basis for many spectacular spells—and some equally astonishing failures.

magic.name: Demolish
magic.description: Destroy target artifact or land.
magic.loreDescription: 철거. 아쿰 고블린들이 즐겨 사용하는 파괴 마법. 건물이든 마법 물품이든 가리지 않고 산산조각 낸다.
magic.cardEffect: Destroy target artifact or land.
magic.flavorText:
"This is why I hate settlements. They lull you into a false sense of security."
—Yon Basrel, Oran-Rief survivalist

magic.name: Desecrated Earth
magic.description: Destroy target land. Its controller discards a card.
magic.loreDescription: 더럽혀진 땅. 구울 드라즈의 저주. 대상의 땅을 파괴하고 손패를 버리게 한다.
magic.cardEffect: Destroy target land. Its controller discards a card.
magic.flavorText:
"The land is swollen with mana, cursed relics, and secrets. If you puncture it, you never know what will burst out."
—Javad Nasrin, Ondu relic hunter

magic.name: Disfigure
magic.description: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
magic.loreDescription: 일그러뜨리기. 구울 드라즈의 저주 마법. 대상을 약화시킨다.
magic.cardEffect: Target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn.
magic.flavorText: "Brave scar or unfortunate tale? It all depends on your pain threshold."

magic.name: Goblin War Paint
magic.description:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
magic.loreDescription: 고블린 전쟁 물감. 착용자에게 신속과 힘을 부여하는 고블린 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste.
magic.flavorText: War paint made from kolya fruit heightens senses and lessens fear. Unfortunately, fear is usually what keeps you alive.

magic.name: Grim Discovery
magic.description:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
magic.loreDescription: 암울한 발견. 구울 드라즈의 사령술. 무덤에서 생물과 땅의 기억을 되살려 손에 되돌린다. 죽음에서 힘을 얻는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target land card from your graveyard to your hand.
magic.flavorText: Few among the living understand just how much of their world is shaped by the ruins of the dead.

magic.name: Harrow
magic.description:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
magic.loreDescription: 땅 갈기. 자신의 땅을 희생해 더 많은 땅을 찾는 드루이드 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
magic.flavorText: The Roil redraws the world as it passes, leaving only the hedrons unchanged.

magic.name: Hideous End
magic.description: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
magic.loreDescription: 끔찍한 최후. 뱀파이어의 처형 마법. 흑마법이 아닌 생물을 즉사시킨다.
magic.cardEffect: Destroy target nonblack creature. Its controller loses 2 life.
magic.flavorText:
"A little dark magic won't stop me. The worse the curse, the better the prize."
—Radavi, Joraga relic hunter, last words

magic.name: Into the Roil
magic.description:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
magic.loreDescription: 로완 속으로. 젠디카르 특유의 마법. 대상을 손으로 돌려보낸다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.
magic.flavorText: "Roil tide! Roil tide! Tie yourselves down!"

magic.name: Ior Ruin Expedition
magic.description:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.
magic.loreDescription: 이오르 유적 탐험. 탐험 카운터를 모아 카드를 뽑는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Draw two cards.

magic.name: Journey to Nowhere
magic.description:
When this enchantment enters, exile target creature.
When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
magic.loreDescription: 어디론가의 여행. 대상을 다른 차원으로 추방하는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
When this enchantment enters, exile target creature.
When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control.

magic.name: Khalni Heart Expedition
magic.description:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
magic.loreDescription: 칼니 심장 탐험. 탐험 카운터를 모아 땅을 찾는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

magic.name: Magma Rift
magic.description:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Magma Rift deals 5 damage to target creature.
magic.loreDescription: 마그마 균열. 화산의 힘으로 대지를 파괴하며 적을 공격.
magic.cardEffect:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Magma Rift deals 5 damage to target creature.
magic.flavorText:
"Lighting a fire needs kindling and heat. You be the kindling. I'll bring the heat."
—Chandra Nalaar

magic.name: Mire Blight
magic.description:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
magic.loreDescription: 적운 날개. 에메리아의 축복으로 비행 능력을 부여하는 마법. 날개가 없는 생물도 하늘을 날 수 있게 해준다.
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.
magic.flavorText:
"Is there anything in Guul Draz that *doesn't* suck the life out of you?"
—Tarsa, Sea Gate sell-sword

magic.name: Narrow Escape
magic.description: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
magic.loreDescription: 아슬아슬한 탈출. 위기의 순간 자신의 것을 구해내는 마법.
magic.cardEffect: Return target permanent you control to its owner's hand. You gain 4 life.
magic.flavorText:
"A good explorer has to be as slippery as a gomazoa, as tough as a scute bug, and luckier than a ten-fingered trapfinder."
—Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

magic.name: Nimbus Wings
magic.description:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has flying.
magic.loreDescription: 적운 날개. 에메리아의 축복으로 비행 능력을 부여하는 마법. 날개가 없는 생물도 하늘을 날 수 있게 해준다.
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2 and has flying.
magic.flavorText: Explorers may find ways into the Sky Ruin, but they find its secrets well protected by shifting hedrons and Roil winds.

magic.name: Paralyzing Grasp
magic.description:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
magic.loreDescription: 마비의 손아귀. 생물을 영원히 탭 상태로 만드는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
magic.flavorText: The Halimar Sea Caves are both the breeding ground of giant squids and the dumping ground of hardened criminals.

magic.name: Relic Crush
magic.description: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
magic.loreDescription: 유물 파쇄. 엘프 드루이드들의 정화 마법. 문명의 산물인 마법진과 장비 둘을 동시에 파괴할 수 있는 강력한 자연의 힘.
magic.cardEffect: Destroy target artifact or enchantment and up to one other target artifact or enchantment.
magic.flavorText: There are many ruins, but there used to be many more.

magic.name: Savage Silhouette
magic.description:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature."
magic.loreDescription: 방패동료의 축복. 코르 전사들이 동료를 지키기 위해 사용하는 순간 방어 마법. 피해를 크게 줄여준다.
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "{1}{G}: Regenerate this creature."
magic.flavorText: Some elves believe that their survival instincts are born of many cycles of reincarnation.

magic.name: Seismic Shudder
magic.description: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
magic.loreDescription: 지진파. 아쿰의 화산 마법. 날지 못하는 모든 것에 피해를 준다.
magic.cardEffect: Seismic Shudder deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.
magic.flavorText:
"The land here seems to go out of its way to kill you."
—Chandra Nalaar

magic.name: Shieldmate's Blessing
magic.description: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
magic.loreDescription: 방패동료의 축복. 코르 전사들이 동료를 지키기 위해 사용하는 순간 방어 마법. 피해를 크게 줄여준다.
magic.cardEffect: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
magic.flavorText:
"Even land dwellers may call for Emeria's grace in times of need."
—Emeria's Creed

magic.name: Slaughter Cry
magic.description: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
magic.loreDescription: 학살의 함성. 고블린 전사들의 전투 고함. 순간적으로 전투력을 폭발시킨다.
magic.cardEffect: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
magic.flavorText:
"Since when did 'AIIIEEEE!' become a negotiation tactic?"
—Nikou, Joraga bard

magic.name: Soul Stair Expedition
magic.description:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.
magic.loreDescription: 영혼 계단 탐험. 탐험 카운터를 모아 무덤의 생물을 되찾는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

magic.name: Spell Pierce
magic.description: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
magic.loreDescription: 퍼지는 바다. 머포크 럴마법사들의 영역 변환 마법. 적의 땅을 섬으로 바꾸어 자신의 영역으로 만든다.
magic.cardEffect: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
magic.flavorText:
"There's a hole in your plan."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

magic.name: Spire Barrage
magic.description: Spire Barrage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.
magic.loreDescription: 첨탑 포격. 아쿰 화염술사들의 마법. 자신이 지배하는 산이 많을수록 더 강력한 화염을 쏟아붓는다.
magic.cardEffect: Spire Barrage deals damage to any target equal to the number of Mountains you control.
magic.flavorText: Goblin lessons include the 2,071 tips for survival. Frek only remembered 2,070.

magic.name: Spreading Seas
magic.description:
Enchant land
When this Aura enters, draw a card.
Enchanted land is an Island.
magic.loreDescription: 퍼지는 바다. 머포크 럴마법사들의 영역 변환 마법. 적의 땅을 섬으로 바꾸어 자신의 영역으로 만든다.
magic.cardEffect:
Enchant land
When this Aura enters, draw a card.
Enchanted land is an Island.
magic.flavorText: Most inhabitants of Zendikar have given up on the idea of an accurate map.

magic.name: Sunspring Expedition
magic.description:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: You gain 8 life.
magic.loreDescription: 태양샘 탐험. 탐험 카운터를 모아 생명력을 얻는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: You gain 8 life.

magic.name: Tanglesap
magic.description: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures without trample.
magic.loreDescription: 엉킴 수액. 무라사 숲의 덩굴 마법. 비행 없는 생물의 피해를 막는다.
magic.cardEffect: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by creatures without trample.
magic.flavorText:
"The blood of the forest is beholden to no one."
—Nissa Revane

magic.name: Trapfinder's Trick
magic.description: Target player reveals their hand and discards all Trap cards.
magic.loreDescription: 뱀파이어의 이빨. 구울 드라즈의 흡혈 마법. 대상에게 흡혈 능력을 부여하고, 키커로 강화하면 더욱 강력한 힘을 준다.
magic.cardEffect: Target player reveals their hand and discards all Trap cards.
magic.flavorText:
"At some point, every trapfinder will lose a hunk of flesh. It's just a question of how much—and whether it'll grow back."
—Arhana, Kazandu trapfinder

magic.name: Vampire's Bite
magic.description:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
magic.loreDescription: 뱀파이어의 이빨. 구울 드라즈의 흡혈 마법. 대상에게 흡혈 능력을 부여하고, 키커로 강화하면 더욱 강력한 힘을 준다.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {2}{B} (You may pay an additional {2}{B} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature gets +3/+0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

magic.name: Vines of Vastwood
magic.description:
Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
magic.loreDescription: 광활한 숲의 덩굴. 대상을 보호하고 강화하는 엘프 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)
Target creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control this turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

magic.name: Zektar Shrine Expedition
magic.description:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Create a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
magic.loreDescription: 젝타르 신전 탐험. 탐험 카운터를 모아 거대한 정령을 소환하는 마법.
magic.cardEffect:
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may put a quest counter on this enchantment.
Remove three quest counters from this enchantment and sacrifice it: Create a 7/1 red Elemental creature token with trample and haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
